product_title: VGA SVGA to HDMI Output 1080P HD Audio TV AV HDTV Video Cable Converter Adapter -

detail.name: VGA SVGA to HDMI Output 1080P HD Audio TV AV HDTV Video Cable Converter Adapter -

details.description_text: Color: Black Voltage: 5V 1A Output: HDMI(Type A 19pin Female) Input: VGA (DB15 Male)and Audio(3.5mm Audio Jack) Device Type: VGA + Audio To HDMI Converter Adapter Brand new and high quality Features 1. VGA analog video + analog audio signal input ; standard HDMI digital signal output. 2. Supports VGA video input: VGA, XGA, SVGA, SXGA, UGA. 3. Convert analog signal( VGA ) to digital signal ( HDMI ). The audio is coupled with the VGA video signal, then audio and video are both converted to HDMI format. 4. HDMI output : support up to 1080P / 60Hz ( output and input format synchronization, frequency synchronization). 5. It applied to the desktop computer, laptop, DVD, Set TOP Box, player and so on VGA signal resource input. 6. Easy to install, no need to driver plug an play. 7. Need external power source, the operating current: 170mA, the universal USB cable supply to demand normal work. How to Use 1. Insert the VGA interface into the computer or other equipment with the VGA output. Please check VGA signal output well. 2. Plug the USB cable connector into USB port to be offered power. 3. Plug 3.5mm audio connector into audio port. 4. Insert other connector into the HDMI cable, and then connect the HDMI cable to the displayer and the projector device with the HDMI interface. 5. Play the video, PPT and documentation, the image will display on the screen of the other display device. Specification 1. Device Type: VGA + Audio To HDMI Converter Adapter 2. Input: VGA (DB15 Male)and Audio(3.5mm Audio Jack) 3. Output: HDMI(Type A 19pin Female) 4. VGA Resolution: 480i/576i/480p/576p/720p/1080i/1080p 5. HDMI Resolution: 480i/576i/480p/576p/720p/1080i/1080p 6. Voltage: 5V 1A 7. Support System: Windows 2000/XP/win7/win8/win10, Mac OS X and so on Important : converter is NOT bi-directional. It only converts from VGA to HDMI. This converter can not be used between the desktop with VGA and laptop with HDMI, as both of them are output signal so it will do not display! Package Includes 1 x VGA + Audio To HDMI Converter Adapter. 1 x USB Cable.
